Package FileAdapter

Class SystemAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileAdapter.SystemAdapter
  • public class SystemAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class controling the system, saving the system to binary file and eporting XML file

      • addRequirement

        public void addRequirement​(java.lang.String projectName,
                           java.lang.String requirementId,
                           int priorityNumber,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           double estimateTime,
                           java.lang.String status,
                           java.lang.String requirementType,
                           MyDate deadline,
                           Employee responsibleEmployee)
        Adds new Requirement object to the RequirementList of the given Project
        Parameters:
        projectName - the name of the Project object to add the Requirement into
        requirementId - the ID of the Requirement object to be added
        priorityNumber - the priority number of the Requirement object to be added
        description - the description of the Requirement object to be added
        estimateTime - the estimate time of the Requirement object to be added
        status - the status of the Requirement object to be added
        requirementType - the type of the Requirement object to be added
        deadline - the deadline og the Requirement object to be added
        responsibleEmployee - the responsibe Employee of the Requirement object

        deadline - the deadline of Requiremnet object to be edited

      • setTask

        public void setTask​(java.lang.String projectName,
                    java.lang.String requirementID,
                    int taskID,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    boolean status,
                    double timeUsed,
                    double estimatedTime,
                    MyDate deadline,
                    EmployeeList employees,
                    Employee responsibleEmployee)
        Edits a Task object with a given path from the system
        Parameters:
        projectName - the name of Project with a Task to be edited
        requirementID - the ID of a Requirement object with a Task to be edited
        taskID - the ID of a Task object to be edited
        description - the description of a Task object to edit
        status - the status of a Task to edit
        timeUsed - the time used of Task object to edit
        estimatedTime - the time estimation of Task object to edit
        deadline - the deadline of Task object to edit
        employees - the Employee objects assigned to Task to edit
        responsibleEmployee - the responsible Employee object of Task to edit
